item.title: Report X-2024080853
item.description:
Report X-2024080853

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-19T21:12:43+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-12
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Federal Express Corporation
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: 1. X-2024080853 This is an undeclared hazmat. The box has no markings on it. The box contains an N232404980 Driver Front Airbag Inflator. The barcode is using a hazmat service code and is asking for HAP to be done. No hazmat certification or OP-900. Unable to pass HAP. Not origin station. 2. X-2024080889 This is an undeclared hazmat. The box has no markings on it. The box contains an N232404980 Driver Front Airbag Inflator. The barcode is using a hazmat service code and is asking for HAP to be done. No hazmat certification or OP-900. Unable to pass HAP. Not origin station. 3. X-2024080902 attachment Name:SDS Pyrotechnic Automotive Safety Devices.pdf

item.title: Report X-2024080797
item.description:
Report X-2024080797

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-19T21:12:43+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-10
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Federal Express Corporation
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: This is an undeclared hazmat. The box contains 8X1gal bottles of HDX Chlorinating Liquid. The outer box has no markings on it. It was found because 4X1gal bottles if chlorinating liquid are dented and leaked. The inner packages that the chlorinating liquid are in have a limited quantity mark on them and the SDS indicates it should be a limited quantity.

item.title: Report X-2024080364
item.description:
Report X-2024080364

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-13T15:14:07+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-06
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: No Hazmat marking or Hazmat Certification on pkg containing 3 x 1 gal metal paint cans with no safety clips/rings. SDS states minimum of Ltd Qty diamond required for main contents. Friction lids failed on paint cans with no clips allowing liquid to leak wetting and coating the contents and carton.

item.title: Report X-2024080363
item.description:
Report X-2024080363

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-13T15:14:07+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-06
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Pkg contains three aerosol cans, one is missing its cap. There are no Hazmat markings on the carton. Glue failed on the top and bottom closures exposing the contents. Had the failure not occurred the hazardous contents may not have been discovered. Pressurized containers will be handled in accordance with regulations.
